${ModID}:Needle.NAME: Needle
${ModID}:Needle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL Gain 3 ${ModID}:Precision for each Skill discarded.

${ModID}:Lock.NAME: Lock
${ModID}:Lock.DESCRIPTION: Retain a card in your hand and gain !M! Block at the end of each turn until you play it.

${ModID}:Curtain.NAME: Curtain
${ModID}:Curtain.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Mirror.NAME: Mirror
${ModID}:Mirror.DESCRIPTION: Put a copy of the top card of your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Nail.NAME: Nail
${ModID}:Nail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain !M! ${ModID}:Precision.

${ModID}:Thread.NAME: Thread
${ModID}:Thread.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw a Skill. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Cloud.NAME: Cloud
${ModID}:Cloud.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less attack damage this turn. NL Exhaust a card in your discard pile.
${ModID}:Cloud.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less attack damage this turn. NL Exhaust a card in your draw or discard pile.

${ModID}:SlashDraw.NAME: Slash Draw
${ModID}:SlashDraw.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. If it was an Attack, play this card again with {!M!|2=twice|3=thrice|@=!M! times} as much damage.

${ModID}:PathToVictory.NAME: Path to Victory
${ModID}:PathToVictory.DESCRIPTION: Put any number of cards from your hand on top of your draw pile and gain !M! ${ModID}:Precision for each.

${ModID}:AnotherMoment.NAME: Another Moment
${ModID}:AnotherMoment.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The first time you play a Skill each turn, Exhaust it and gain 1 Dexterity.
${ModID}:AnotherMoment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a Skill each turn, Exhaust it and gain 1 Dexterity.
